label: It is not a strange site to see small groups of U,S, servicemen enjoying a well earned break in Tel-Aviv, The servicemen are part of the force sent to Israel to man patriot batteries, All the servicemen are ensured hospitality from Israeli families as well as opportunities to tour the country that they are here to help defend from Iraqi missiles.
